name: Kuju Coffee Pocket Pour Over One-Cup Pouch Bold Awakening Coffee
categories: Pocket Pour Over One-Cup Pouch Bold Awakening
description: Kuju’s Bold Awakening is a full-bodied, low-acid blend with earthy notes of cocoa and berries. Developed by 2 Eagle Scouts who were fed up with instant coffee, Kuju delivers your morning caffeine hit with the ease of dropping a tea bag into a mug.Pocket PourOver™ delivers fresh coffee in moments.Steady-Safe™ anchor system attaches to most mugs.Nitro-Flush™ techn keeps coffee fresh for up to 12 months.Small batch-roasted coffee comes from a family farm in Thailand that employs people rescued from the sex trade, and pays above fair-trade wages.
